summary:
Able to execute and/or cooperate in different integrated international business operations in the fields of, international trade, international business development, and market research. Capable of fulfilling these tasks in an international setting at a tactic level, whilst communicating senior management of changes in the business environment. 

CEFR (C2) in English, Dutch, Portuguese and (B2) Spanish. Core competencies:
• Entrepreneurial • Analytical Capability • Intercultural Competency • Market Research • International Trade • Ethical and Corporate Responsibility

Fábrica da Floresta', 'description': "Trading company focused  on renewable ingredients for the food and beverage, cosmetics, pharmaceutical and supplement industries. Developing upstream supply-chains in the Amazon rainforest

Scope of tasks include:
• Developed and executed a commercial(exports) strategy, allocating resources and setting commercial team goals, defining budgets, analyse budget variances, monitor progress and targets.
• Developed and maintained high-quality relationships with new and existing international customers, distributors and other business relations. Key-Account management. 
• Manage trading and marketing programme. Trading, forex-hedging, trade-finacing, procuring, negotiating, sales-project planning and delegation, customer acquisition, lead generation.
     o Coordinate attendance of trade-fairs, international cooperation events, seminars, business rounds and other events.
• Market research and qualification, in-depth analysis of potential markets macroeconomic, sociocultural and political landscapes. Target market selection, defining market entry strategy.
• Continuously monitor changes in trade policies, determine risks that could adversely affect the companies operations:
     o Represent the company’s interests with port operators, governmental agencies and liaison with industry federation, export agencies and other interest groups.
• Measure KPI's and KSF's, design and improve process maps, defining operational policies and processes, designing BPM, optimising pipeline phases and CRM.
• Address non-conformity’s, create action plans to reduce or mitigate risks and maximise opportunities.", 'title': 'Trade Coordinator', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}, {'location': 'Belém Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': '100% Amazonia | Fábrica da Floresta', 'description': '• Draw business plan and investment appraisal, measure economic viability of the project, determine the capex cost of the processing unit, profit margin and internal rate of return.
• Applying for and obtaining a DHI subsidy grant (Dutch government)
• Research and outline Brazilian administrative, fiscal and operational import procedures for capital goods. Apply for a “ex-tarifario” concession.
• Research and map local suppliers, product market combinations, market size, growth and consumption drivers for fruit powders, and competitive intensity.
• Designing of the supply-chain, highlighting stakeholders along the supply-chain. Forecasting resources required for operations and capital expenditure
• Develop exit strategies for the private equity group', 'title': 'Business Developer', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 534848, 'name': 'BRF', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGTmh0J0Zrmag/company-logo_400_400/0/1637926533928?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=Jn_GKWxoPWPEGEP8Rppgkn78G_7y7nmhtW0IF6Fh6nQ', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/brf/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': '’s-Hertogenbosch, North Brabant Province, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2015}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2016}}, 'company': 'BRF', 'description': 'BRF one of the world largest producers of fresh and frozen animal protein. Within the EU, BRF focuses on the trade and processing of frozen turkey and poultry.

Accomplishments: Created, maintained and implemented a client and product-pricing database for the B2C and Food-Service markets, using SAP resources. Reducing sales workload, pricing errors and corrective activities. Increasing efficiency by 20% in my department.

Scope of tasks include:
• Executing sales contracts for UK, Dutch, German and Belgian market (B2B, FS, B2C).
• Procuring inbound resources (import) and monitoring attached lead times, documentation control and follow-up on clearance of good, intake and deliverance of finished goods.
• Compiling weekly analyses of stock levels, planned orders and contracts, initiating actions with different departments to reduce no deliveries and increase inventory turnover.
• Customer relationship management, seeking to improve customer satisfaction, aligning supply-chain stakeholders’ requirements, communicating and aligning these with internal and external parties.', 'title': 'Customer Service Analyst', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 3180812, 'name': 'IA Sustentável', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQHO7RCF73NG9A/company-logo_400_400/0/1519877789367?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=DoL_Ynytlrg2DmcnsyQHIWOCmCzG9NidmisXe_EQnhc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/ia-inteligenciambiental/', 'employees': {'start': 2, 'end': 10}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'São Paulo Area, Brazil', 'date': {'start': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'IA Sustentável', 'description': 'An environmental consultancy and service company, offering a variety of environmental investigation and remediation services focused on the bio-remediation concept and environmental consulting such as viability and environmental impact studies.

Management Assistant

• Enable the company administratively and fiscally (Siscomex, RADAR) to import the bio-remediation equipment.
• Participating on (inter)national seminars, congresses and trade-fairs. Encouraging bio-remediation methods and international-cooperation.
• Analyse company performance through a GAP analysis, competitive analysis and value chain analysis, and advice on the implementation of the bio-remediation concept on the Brazilian market.
• Assisting the company in participating on (inter)national seminars, congresses and trade-fairs. Stimulating bio-remediation methods and international-cooperation as well as actively participating on the environmental debate.
- Holland-Brazil Cooperation Seminar: Remediation of Soil and Guidelines for Groundwater Management (State of São Paulo Industries Federation • FIESP)
- XV Responsible Act Congress: The Chemical Industry Environmental Footprint and New Challenges (Brazilian Chemical Industry Association • Abiquim)', 'title': 'Intern', 'employment_type': None}]}]
